trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of groups within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合內的群組<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the ListViewGroupCollection associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>與相關聯的屬性，即可取得 ListViewGroupCollection<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This collection contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects that represent the groups shown in the control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此集合包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>物件，代表顯示於控制項中的群組時的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>以外的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}".
trans-unit.target: 不會指派給群組的任何項目會出現在預設群組中，有標頭標籤"DefaultGroup {0}"。

trans-unit.source: The default group is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, and cannot be altered.
trans-unit.target: 預設群組未包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合，且無法變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups.
trans-unit.target: 它主要是用於偵錯，以確保所有項目有已正確新增至群組。

trans-unit.source: If there are no groups in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, the grouping feature is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在群組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合中，群組功能已停用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method to add a single group to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>方法，將單一群組加入至集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a group at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A>方法，將群組加入集合中的特定索引處。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove a group, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除群組，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the group at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法移除特定索引處的群組。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: 您無法加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>不止一次集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: To reposition a group within the collection, it must first be removed from the collection, and then inserted at the desired location.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整集合內的群組，您必須先從集合中移除，然後插入所需的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷特定的群組是否已在集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a group within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取集合中群組的索引，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the group at a particular index with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Item%2A> indexer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在取得或設定此群組具有特定索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Item%2A>索引子。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add multiple groups to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將多個群組加入至集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a ListViewGroupCollection that you retrieve through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入多個群組，做為陣列的群組或與您透過擷取 ListViewGroupCollection<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>另一個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法從集合中移除所有群組。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> methods remove groups from the collection, but do not remove any items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法，從集合中移除群組，但未移除任何項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are no groups in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, the grouping feature is disabled and all items in the control are displayed normally.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在群組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合已停用分組功能和控制項中的所有項目會正常顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> methods are useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法都很實用，當您想要提供多種方式可以群組中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create multiple group arrays.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請建立多個群組陣列。

trans-unit.source: To change the grouping, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the next array of groups to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更群組，請先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將下一個要顯示的群組陣列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the groups in a collection to a compatible array starting at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法，將群組複製到相容的陣列，指定索引處開始的集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，例如，當您想要在集合中使用群組<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請將群組複製到相容的陣列，然後排序陣列。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the sorted array back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將已排序的陣列加入至集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A> property to determine how many groups are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>屬性來判斷多少群組是在集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To iterate through the collection, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要逐一查看集合，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>從傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The grouping feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 群組功能時，只能在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列產品上使用您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版作業系統，與群組相關的任何程式碼將會被忽略，不會出現群組。

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，取決於群組功能的任何程式碼可能無法正確運作。

trans-unit.source: You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會想要包含的測試，判斷群組功能是否可用，並提供無法使用時的替代功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以提供替代的排序時不支援依群組排序的作業系統上執行。

trans-unit.source: > > The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: >> 插入標記功能會提供相同的文件庫提供作業系統主題功能。

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法多載，並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>至集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來加入現有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>至集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: 您無法加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>不止一次集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Add method using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫新增方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>已經在集合中新增會失敗，則傳回-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: To add multiple groups to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將多個群組加入至集合，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>来加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the group within the collection, or -1 if the group is already present in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 群組內該集合，則為-1 的群組已存在於集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: group contains at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: group包含至少一個屬於以外擁有這個控制項 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the collection using the specified values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*> properties
trans-unit.target: 將新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>至使用指定的值來初始化集合<> *> 和<> *> 屬性

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*> property for the new group.
trans-unit.target: 初始值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*>新群組的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*> property for the new group.
trans-unit.target: 初始值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*>新群組的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of groups to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入集合中的群組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use this version of the AddRange method to add an array of groups to the group collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個版本的 AddRange 方法群組集合中加入的群組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> objects and want to add them to the collection with a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相當實用，當您建立多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>物件，並想要將它們新增至具有單一方法呼叫的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: To add individual groups to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入集合中的個別群組，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時也很有用您想要提供多種方式可以群組中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create multiple group arrays.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請建立多個群組陣列。

trans-unit.source: To change the grouping, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the AddRange method to add a different array of groups.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更群組，請先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法，從集合中移除所有群組然後使用 AddRange 方法加入的群組不同的陣列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method, the AddRange method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>方法，AddRange 方法沒有傳回值，可用來判斷是否要加入的群組已經在集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need this information, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method before using the AddRange method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要這項資訊，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>方法，再使用 AddRange 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> that specifies the groups to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref> ，指定要加入至集合的群組。

trans-unit.source: groups contains at least one group with at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: groups包含至少一個群組，且至少一個屬於以外擁有這個控制項 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the groups in an existing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入群組中的現有<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>至集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection> that you retrieve through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將加入的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection>您擷取透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法沒有傳回值，可用來判斷是否要加入的群組已經在集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need this information, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要這項資訊，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>方法，再使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref> containing the groups to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref>包含要加入至集合的群組。

trans-unit.source: groups contains at least one group with at least one that belongs to a control other than the one that owns this .
trans-unit.target: groups包含至少一個群組，且至少一個屬於以外擁有這個控制項 。

trans-unit.source: Removes all groups from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有群組。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all the groups from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法從集合中移除所有群組。

trans-unit.source: Note that removing groups from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection does not remove items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，移除群組從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合不會移除項目從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to disable the grouping feature.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是停用分組功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: When there are no groups in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, the items appear normally.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有在群組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制的項目會正常顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To remove individual groups from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除個別的群組，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要提供多個項目分組的方式時，這個方法也很有用。

trans-unit.source: To change the grouping, first use the Clear method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add a different array of groups.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更群組，請先使用清除方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將不同的陣列的群組。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified group is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要在集合中位於指定的群組。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: 您無法加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>不止一次集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: However, attempting to add another copy will not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不過，嘗試加入另一個複本不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the addition will simply fail.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，加入將失敗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A> method will return a value of –1 in this case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>方法會在此情況下傳回 –&1; 的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A> methods, however, do not have return values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A>方法，不過，沒有傳回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding groups using one of these methods, use the Contains method to determine whether a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入時使用這些方法的其中一個群組，使用 Contains 方法來判斷特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>已經位於集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>要在集合中尋找。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the group is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在集合中，群組否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the groups in the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 群組集合中複製至相容的一維<xref:System.Array>，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the groups in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 到相容的陣列，指定索引處開始，要複製的群組集合 （包括所包含的項目參考） 中使用 CopyTo 方法。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，例如，當您想要在集合中使用群組<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Array.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請將群組複製到相容的陣列，然後排序陣列。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the sorted array back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將已排序的陣列加入至集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> to which the groups are copied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>會複製群組。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The first index within the array to which the groups are copied.
trans-unit.target: 群組複製到陣列中的第一個索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的群組數目。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷集合中的群組數目。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to loop through the collection and perform the same operation on each group.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要集合執行迴圈，並執行相同的作業，針對每個群組時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法來逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The number of groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的群組數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you need to iterate through the collection to perform the same operation on each group.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要重複執行相同的作業，針對每個群組集合時，這個方法會很有用。

trans-unit.source: You can also loop through the collection once for each group, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of loops.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過針對每個群組，一次集合迴圈使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>屬性來決定迴圈的數目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that represents the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>表示的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>集合內。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index of a group within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來判斷集合中群組的索引。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, to determine the index of each group when you iterate through the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，例如，當您逐一查看集合時，決定每個群組的索引<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>要在集合中尋找。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the group within the collection, or -1 if the group is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 群組集合中，則為-1 的群組不在集合內的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來插入現有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>集合內的特定索引處。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> to the collection more than once.
trans-unit.target: 您無法加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>不止一次集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>

trans-unit.source: When you call the Insert method using a group that is already in the collection, the insertion simply fails.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫插入方法，使用群組與已經在集合中時，插入是只會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A> method before the insertion to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>方法來判斷特定的群組是否已在集合中插入之前。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: To reposition a group within the collection, you must first remove it, and then insert it at the desired index.
trans-unit.target: 重新定位集合內的群組，您必須先移除它，並再將其插入所需的索引處。

trans-unit.source: The index within the collection at which to insert the group.
trans-unit.target: 要插入之群組集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>来插入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>集合內指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the group at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可以用於擷取集合中的指定索引處的群組。

trans-unit.source: When you have a reference to the group object and need the index, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您有群組物件的參考，而且需要索引時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index within the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>来取得或設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>集合內指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: index小於 0 或大於或等於。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>具有指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the group to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> with the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>具有指定名稱，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>存在。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>從集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have a reference to the group.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法從集合移除群組，當您有群組的參考。

trans-unit.source: Note that removing a group from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection does not remove items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，從群組移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合不會移除項目從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To remove a group at a particular index, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定索引處的群組，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法而。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all the groups from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除所有群組，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>若要從集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>集合內指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a group from the collection when you have the index of the group within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合移除群組，您擁有的群組集合中的索引時使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that removing groups from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection does not remove items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，移除群組從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合不會移除項目從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To remove a group using a reference to the object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除群組，使用物件的參考，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>方法而。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all the groups from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除所有群組，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您從集合移除項目時，集合中後續項目的索引將會變更。

trans-unit.source: All information about the removed item is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 會刪除所有移除的項目相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The index within the collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否同步化存取集合 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可以用來對集合同步存取。

trans-unit.source: The object used to synchronize the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來將集合同步化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> has been added.
trans-unit.target: 索引處<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>已新增。

trans-unit.target: valueis not a .

trans-unit.target: -value包含至少一個屬於以外擁有這個控制項 。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified value is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要在集合中位於指定的值。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>要在集合中尋找。

trans-unit.source: if value is a contained in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 是包含在集合; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index within the collection of the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定值的集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to find in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to find in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of value if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引 value 是否在集合中，否則為-1。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup>, it is not added to the collection.

trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出集合是否具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>集合內指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> that represents the item located at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>表示位於集合中指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref>從<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup"> </xref>移除<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection"> </xref>。
